flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour, and 60 seconds in a minute so there are 60*60 = <<60*60=6300>>6300 seconds in an hour
The device records data every 5 seconds so there will be 6300/5 = <<6300/5=1260>>1260 instances of data in an hour.
#### 1260

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600, not 6300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
